#ProofOfKeys day was cute, but the emphasis should be a daily occurrence, not just 1 day a year.   Coinbase alone holds 25% of $LTC, 8% of $ETH and 5% of $BTC in circulation. Clearly a good number of people don't care about/know about key management still. Education > Hashtags

Litecoin is sound money for the world.   PayPal processes ~193 transactions per second globally. Litecoin can process 45 tx per second at only ~80% SegWit use, but this is only half the picture. LTC can combine multiple payments in one TX; so 1 TX can actually be 10 payments. (1)  https://t.co/YbEdK15wlW
